Audio.Locality: Reserva Ecológica de Guapi Açu (REGUA), RJ
Audio.Author: Eric DeFonso
Audio.Comments: Bird in an open woodland area nestled within primary forest. Wind and other noise filtered below 300 Hz. Recorded along the Green trail which is away from the main lodge grounds and wetlands and heads into the higher hills in the reserve.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no""
